```{r setup}
#| include: false
library(ggplot2)    # install.packages("ggplot2")
library(patchwork)  # install.packages("patchwork")
library(mvtnorm)    # install.packages("mvtnorm")

plot_ests <- function(ests) {
  # Marginal sample distribution
  plot_beta_1 <- ggplot() +
    geom_histogram(aes(x = ests[, 2])) +
    labs(x = "Estimated beta 1", y = NULL)
  plot_beta_2 <- ggplot() +
    geom_histogram(aes(x = ests[, 3])) +
    labs(x = "Estimated beta 2", y = NULL)

  # Joint sampling distribution of \hat{\beta}_1 and \hat{\beta}_2
  plot_beta_joint <- ggplot() +
    geom_bin_2d(aes(x = ests[, 2], y = ests[, 3]), bins = 50) + 
    labs(x = "Estimated beta 1", y = "Estimated beta 2")

  (plot_beta_1 + plot_beta_1) / plot_beta_joint
}
```
